title: Remove Node Taint
description: Remove the taint with key ||app|| from the single cluster node.

prerequisites: NODE=$(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}'); kubectl taint nodes $NODE app=legacy:NoSchedule

validations.command: kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}' | xargs kubectl describe node | grep -c 'app=' || echo '0'
validations.description: Node should not have the app taint
